text: Sir Paul Godwin Scoon (4 July 1935 â€“ 2 September 2013) was Governor-General of Grenada from 1978 to 1992. He was in charge during the rise and fall of the People's Revolutionary Government and during the Invasion of Grenada. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Governors- General of Grenada Category:University of Toronto alumni
title: Paul Scoon
